notes.text:
This update for libssh2_org fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-22218: Fixed a bug in _libssh2_packet_add() which allows to access out of bounds memory. (bsc#1214527)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: An issue was discovered in function _libssh2_packet_add in libssh2 1.10.0 allows attackers to access out of bounds memory.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
